title: How to Draw a Cartoon Hippo

steps.headline: Draw a large oval.
steps.description: This is the body. Add a smaller circle for the head.

steps.headline: Give your hippo four legs and two small ears.
Give your hippo a face: eyes, eyebrows, nostrils, teeth - whatever you want.
steps.description: Make him what you want him to be.

steps.headline: Add details to body and feet.
steps.description: Draw a tail. Remember: every line you make adds to his personality.

text: Draw a large oval. This is the body. Add a smaller circle for the head. Give your hippo four legs and two small ears.  Erase extra lines.  Give your hippo a face: eyes, eyebrows, nostrils, teeth - whatever you want. Make him what you want him to be. Add details to body and feet. Draw a tail. Remember: every line you make adds to his personality.
